评论概述: Great for going out or staying in.
评论详情: These fit me perfectly, I'm 5'3, about 110 lbs. I wear them as my nice pants, and I wear them as my cozy pants. The pockets fit my phone (which is admittedly smaller than most newer phones). And they have good stretch and are a good thickness.
Super comfortable and very flattering cut...not too narrow in the leg but not too flared, plus there are the always handy pockets ! This is my second pair as they are my go to favorites !

They fit really nice. I just had a baby n they are very soft n go over the mommy belly without hurting me. The only thing is the seem right in the crotch area is coming undone. Didn’t notice until too late to return. I bought them to go back to work in n I think they will be just fine.

I love these pants so much that I ordered them in several colors. They are soft, comfortable and because they are boot cut, they flare a little at the bottom so I think they look a little nicer than regular yoga pants. I ordered a large and I am 5'10" and 150 lbs. so they are also long enough for my height.

I wake up on the run! These are comfortable and soft! The material holds up and is just the perfect thickness. I live in Upper Michigan and they are not too cold to wear outside. I use them as dress pants for work and they look and work perfectly! All day comfort!!!

Oh my gosh these are my new favorite brand and pants! Upon first try they’re so buttery soft but after a wash it lost it a tiny bit. But still soft just not as buttery. But wow they’re comfy are around. It’s thick enough that it’s not see through but not hot to wear. Love the pockets. Big enough to fit my iPhone. Definitely worth the money!

评论概述: If your 5'5" they are way to long
评论详情: Xl very soft and comfy just to long

The pants fit perfectly and surprisingly they are not too long even with flat shoes. I'm 5'4" and I wanted a less legging-look but still the comfort of the material and fit. I plan to get a few more in the same color. I purchased size M and it worked out great. It's comfortable like leggings yet a bit more dressy like pants. And best of all: the side pockets to fit my phone, wallet and car keys. I like to have my hands free while shopping and not having to wear a purse. Happy customer :). I highly recommend these pants.
I have these in a number of colours. Wear them for work. Great fit and quality.
I have purchased a couple of these now, extremely comfortable! Washes up nicely, no fading or shrinkage. I will be purchasing more of these pants. I highly recommend.
These are SO comfortable and flattering! Love the pockets.
They are very soft abd comfortable. I had to go up a size to medium because I don't like them really tight.  I usually wear small or size 3 in pants.
They fit great, not skin tight like most leggings. Good pocket placement. I can actually go out in public wearing them!
These pants fit very well. The length is perfect and the material is soft and durable.

评论概述: I ended up sending these back

I love the function with the pocket, so I got the dark blue pair instead. They were out of the black which I was bummed, but the blue is pretty dark.

I love the fit and the length and they are a touch thicker material unlike other brands.

I ordered the gray ones, they are so cute. These are the best yoga pants to wear around the house, running errands or for a casual athleisure look. They are boot cut and very flattering, nice waist band- not too tight but holds it all in. highly recommend!  I wish they came in other colors, I would buy them up! They are true to size.
Perfect for my needs

they fit great i will get another pair soon comfortable casual when i dont want jeans

This is my fourth purchase of a Balance Collection item. There is no comparison to any other brand I’ve tried. The yoga pants are well made with quality material that lasts. The fit is flattering and so comfortable. They still look great after many washings. Love them!!
Love wearing these and bummed it’s hot outside now but can’t wait for cooler weather to wear them. They’re so soft and fit snug but not tight.

These are comfy pants and I’ve always loved the balance collection in general. I bought these pants in late October. Two and a half months later I noticed a hole that’s definitely not from wear and though it’s next to the seam, it’s not fixable without creating a pucker. I’m very disappointed there’s no way to contact the seller after 30 days!
I'm 5 2 and the length was perfect Very comfortable. I had to buy a second pair.
Love material, fit, and pricing
I really like these pants.  The material is so soft and comfortable.
soft, comfortable - pockets too!
Love it

El producto anunciado es diferente al que viene en el interior de la bolsa, el producto indica pantalón azul largo y en su interior viene un pantalón corto y negro, la calidad del producto es muy buena, lástima que no esté bien etiquetado
I like this type of pants to be thigh on me not just to fit well I should have taken a medium rather than a large The material thickness and high waist is perfect comfort

I have other Balance leggings which fit me in small this was a very long wait (month and half!) to find out that unfortunately they were too tight and too long for me. Nice fabric though despite there not being any more cotton ones that I can see available.
